NAME: Sun Knight
DESCRIPTION: Transforms #yWorkers in hand into random #yApostasy cards on enter; gains [E] during #yApostasy.
UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transforms #yWorkers in hand into random lower-cost #yApostasy cards on enter; gains [E] during #yApostasy.

NAME: Naked Afei
DESCRIPTION: Deals #b%d damage on enter; permanently increases the damage by #b%d whenever he takes damage.

NAME: Xiangdangdang
DESCRIPTION: Exhausts half of the #yRabbles in the discard pile on enter, gaining #b%d temporary health for each one; all non-0-cost attack cards have the same effect as #yInvite.

NAME: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Lightening
DESCRIPTION: On attack deal 3 damage to enemies wearing metal or constructs.

NAME: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Ice
DESCRIPTION: On attack reduce 1 #yStrength on enemy this turn.

NAME: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Poison
DESCRIPTION: On attack deal 1 #yPoison to organic enemies.

NAME: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Fire
DESCRIPTION: On attack deal 3 damage to enemies wearing flammables.

NAME: Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang Solid
DESCRIPTION: Damage taken cannot exceed temporary health.
